column2: we ordered everything on the menu and everything was absolutely delicious.  The brisket was juicy and smokey
column5: which soaked up most of the moisture; order the platter.  The pulled pork was moist
column6: soft and had just the right amount of sauce.  The ribs were perfectly done.  My personal favorite were the baby backs
column7: which had the right combination of smoke and sweetness.  I don't think we used the sauce more than once.  The Texas sausage was a bit underwhelming
column8: but went better with the sauce than the ribs did.
